item.title: How Digital Nomads Choose Their Living Environment
item.author: xiangaoole@gmail.com (Harold Gao)
item.description: For over a year, I have stayed in 8 cities across 7 countries during my travels, mostly in AirBnb homestays, and also in two co-living communities. I have some personal insights on long-term living environments suitable for remote work (over a month). Gap Year TimelineðŸŒ†In terms of city climate, Yunnan Dali, Thailand Chiang Mai, Malaysia Penang, and Indonesia Bali are
